mapper.select: SELECT oh.cityId ,oh.current ,c.Sido ,c.weatherName ,ai.FineDustConcentration pm10 ,ai.UltrafineDustConcentration pm25 FROM OPENWEATHER_HOURLY oh LEFT JOIN CITYNAME c ON oh.cityId = c.cityId LEFT JOIN AIRQUALITY_INFO ai ON oh.cityId = ai.CityId WHERE oh.cityId=#{cityId}

SELECT tmmt.cityId ,ai.FineDustConcentration as pm10 ,ai.UltrafineDustConcentration as pm25 ,ai.OzoneConcentration as ozon ,tmmt.maxTemp ,tmmt.minTemp ,wir.Temperatures as temp ,wir.PrecipitationProbability as pop ,wir.Humidity as humidity ,wir.windSpeed ,wir.windDirection ,wir.Weather ,wir.hour24 ,wir.hour03 ,wir.hour06 ,wir.hour09 ,wir.hour12 ,wir.hour15 ,wir.hour18 ,wir.hour21 ,wi.weekT1 ,wi.weekTH1 ,weekPop1 ,weekK1 ,wi.weekT2 ,wi.weekTH2 ,weekPop2 ,weekK2 ,wi.weekT3 ,wi.weekTH3 ,weekPop3 ,weekK3 ,wi.weekT4 ,wi.weekTH4 ,weekPop4 ,weekK4 ,wi.weekT5 ,wi.weekTH5 ,weekPop5 ,weekK5 ,wi.weekT6 ,wi.weekTH6 ,weekPop6 ,weekK6 ,wi.weekT7 ,wi.weekTH7 ,weekPop7 ,weekK7 FROM TODAY_MIN_MAX_TEMP tmmt LEFT JOIN AIRQUALITY_INFO ai ON tmmt.cityId = ai.CityId LEFT JOIN WEATHER_INFO wi ON tmmt.cityId = wi.CityId LEFT JOIN WEATHER_INFO_RSS wir ON tmmt.cityId = wir.CityId WHERE tmmt.cityId=#{cityId}
SELECT ai.FineDustConcentration ,ai.UltrafineDustConcentration FROM AIRQUALITY_INFO ai WHERE cityId=#{cityId}
SELECT weatherName, dustName, x, y, rss_short FROM CITYNAME ORDER BY cityId asc

choose.otherwise: UPDATE AIRQUALITY_INFO SET Date = '-' ,FineDustConcentration = '-' ,UltrafineDustConcentration = '-' ,OzoneConcentration = '-' WHERE CityId between #{initialNum} and #{finalNum}
